mapper.select: SELECT * FROM QNA WHERE MEMBER_NUMBER = #{MEMBER_NUMBER} AND NOT QNA_CATEGORY='상품문의' order by qna_number desc
SELECT * FROM QNA WHERE MEMBER_NUMBER = #{MEMBER_NUMBER} AND QNA_REPSTATE='문의종료' AND NOT QNA_CATEGORY='상품문의' order by qna_number desc
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM QNA WHERE MEMBER_NUMBER = #{MEMBER_NUMBER} AND NOT QNA_CATEGORY = '상품문의'

select A.REVIEW_NUMBER, A.GOODS_NUMBER, A.GOODS_NAME, A.GOODS_THUMBNAIL, A.REVIEW_TITLE, A.REVIEW_REGDATE, A.REVIEW_IMAGE, A.REVIEW_CONTENT, A.REVIEW_GRADE, A.MEMBER_NUMBER FROM (SELECT * FROM review NATURAL JOIN goods) A WHERE MEMBER_NUMBER = #{MEMBER_NUMBER} ORDER BY REVIEW_NUMBER DESC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM ORDERLIST NATURAL JOIN GOODS) A WHERE MEMBER_NUMBER = #{MEMBER_NUMBER} AND NOT GOODS_STATE = '반품신청' AND NOT GOODS_STATE = '반품완료' AND NOT GOODS_STATE = '교환신청' AND NOT GOODS_STATE = '교환완료' ORDER BY ORDER_DATE DESC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM ORDERLIST NATURAL JOIN GOODS) A WHERE GOODS_PAY_STATE='결제완료' AND DELIVERY_STATE = '배송완료' AND GOODS_STATE IN ('구매확정', '반품신청', '반품완료') AND MEMBER_NUMBER = #{MEMBER_NUMBER} ORDER BY ORDER_DATE DESC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM ORDERLIST NATURAL JOIN GOODS) A WHERE GOODS_PAY_STATE='결제완료' AND DELIVERY_STATE = '배송완료' AND GOODS_STATE IN ('구매확정', '교환신청', '교환완료') AND MEMBER_NUMBER = #{MEMBER_NUMBER} ORDER BY ORDER_DATE DESC
